00103             function                add_trace_string( $Str , $Type = COMMON )
00104             {
00105                   try
00106                   {
00107                         $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , "trace_line_$Type.tpl" );
00108                         $Template = str_replace( '{string}' , $Str , $Template );
00109                         
00110                         $this->TraceStrings [] = $Template;
00111                   }
00112                   catch( Exception $e )
00113                   {
00114                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00115                   }

00136             function                start_group( $Str )
00137             {
00138                   try
00139                   {
00140                         $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , "trace_start_group.tpl" );
00141                         $Template = str_replace( '{string}' , $Str , $Template );
00142                         $Template = str_replace( '{i}' , count( $this->TraceStrings ) , $Template );
00143                         
00144                         $this->TraceStrings [] = $Template;
00145                   }
00146                   catch( Exception $e )
00147                   {
00148                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00170             function                end_group( $Count = 1 )
00171             {
00172                   try
00173                   {
00174                         for( $i = 0 ; $i < $Count ; $i++ )
00175                         {
00176                               $this->TraceStrings [] = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , "trace_end_group.tpl" );

00178                   }

00181                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00204             {
00205                   try
00206                   {

00236             function                compile_trace()
00237             {
00238                   try
00239                   {
00240                         $Output  = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'trace_start.tpl' );
00241 
00242                         $Output .= implode( '' , $this->TraceStrings );
00243                         
00244                         $Output .= $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'trace_end.tpl' );
00245                   
00246                         $Output = str_replace( 
00247                               '{output}' , $Output , $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'trace.tpl' )
00248                         );
00249                   
00250                         return( "<div class='trace'>$Output</div>" );
00251                   }
00252                   catch( Exception $e )
00253                   {
00254                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
